Text: Again, many Thx to you tadjad48bl, for all the great Pie albums that you have made possible to DL. Humble Pie were one of the GREATEST Super Bands of it's era. I surely think they were the best live band beside Deep Purple in the Hard Rock scene. It's a pity i didn't have the chance to see them live. Steve Marriott had a remarcable deeply Soulfull voice that could stretch out in any directions, absolutly Worldclass.
Could we get a re-seed on this please...thanks !!!!
